author: Nero
Claude
install_msg: Perfect TicTacToe cog installed. Play tic-tac-toe against an unbeatable AI. Use `[p]help PerfectTTT` for commands.
name: PerfectTTT
short: Play tic-tac-toe against an unbeatable AI
description: A tic-tac-toe game where the AI uses the minimax algorithm to play perfectly. The AI will never lose and will win whenever possible.
end_user_data_statement: This cog stores temporary game state information in memory while a game is in progress. All data is cleared when the game ends.
